name: Swing Rally
description:
Your car can't really maneuver. Swing on poles, avoid crashing on walls and collect coins to open gates in order to finish this wacky rally.

---
Keyboard
A/D to turn Left/Right
S to throw rope
---
XBox Controller
D-Pad to turn Left/Right
A to throw rope

Arhan Bakan - Programming, Design

opengameart.org - Graphics and Music

BFXR - Sound Effects
